de.humatic.nmj

Class NetworkMidiSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiSystem

  • public class NetworkMidiSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The api's core singleton object providing access to MIDI ports.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exit()
      Closes the system, shutting down all opened ports and discovery threads.
      static NetworkMidiSystem get()
      Returns the singleton NetworkMidiSystem instance after it has been initialized using get(android.content.Context).
      static NetworkMidiSystem get(android.content.Context parent)
      Initializes the system and returns a singleton NetworkMidiSystem instance.
      boolean isOpen(int io, int ch)
      Checks whether the port at %ch is open for in- or output
      NetworkMidiInput openInput(int chIdx, NetworkMidiClient nmc)
      Opens a network MIDI channel as configured via NMJConfig for input (i.e. receiving Midi data).
      NetworkMidiOutput openOutput(int chIdx, NetworkMidiClient nmc)
      Opens the network MIDI channel at %chIdx as configured via NMJConfig for output (i.e. sending Midi data).

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static NetworkMidiSystem get(android.content.Context parent)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes the system and returns a singleton NetworkMidiSystem instance. nmj uses android SharedPreferences to store its setup. These are only accessible via the calling activity, so when first getting access to the MidiSystem it is required to use this method. Throws Exception if setup fails due to insufficient privileges or other reasons.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • get

        public static NetworkMidiSystem get()
        Returns the singleton NetworkMidiSystem instance after it has been initialized using get(android.content.Context).

      • openInput

        public NetworkMidiInput openInput(int chIdx,
                         NetworkMidiClient nmc)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Opens a network MIDI channel as configured via NMJConfig for input (i.e. receiving Midi data). If the channel has already been opened before the running instance will be returned. To read MIDI from the channel implement NetworkMidiListener and add the implementing class to the Input's listener list.
        Throws IndexOutOfBoundsException for invalid channel indices
        IOException if the channel is not configured for input.
        May throw network on main thread errors depending on an application's StrictMode settings when called from the UI thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • openOutput

        public NetworkMidiOutput openOutput(int chIdx,
                           NetworkMidiClient nmc)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Opens the network MIDI channel at %chIdx as configured via NMJConfig for output (i.e. sending Midi data). If the channel has already been opened before the running instance will be returned.
        Throws IndexOutOfBoundsException for invalid channel indices
        IOException if the channel is not configured for output.
        May throw network on main thread errors depending on an application's StrictMode settings when called from the UI thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen(int io,
             int ch)
        Checks whether the port at %ch is open for in- or output

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Closes the system, shutting down all opened ports and discovery threads.
